SELECT
M_TRACK.ID as "id", M_TRACK.NAME as "name", M_TRACK.ARTIST as "artist", M_TRACK.INSTRUMENTAL as "instrumental", M_TRACK.ORIGINAL as "original",
FROM M_FILE LEFT JOIN M_TRACK ON M_FILE.ID = M_TRACK.ID LEFT JOIN M_ARTICLE ON M_FILE.ARTICLE_ID = M_ARTICLE.ID
M_ARTICLE.ID = #{articleId} AND M_FILE.DEL_FLG='0' AND M_TRACK.DEL_FLG='0'
ORDER BY M_FILE.ORDER_NO
